column5: We use dodgers to catch bluefish however if it is shiny they will bite.  Art
Yup. Flaten out an american MGD can, add a hook, and it will catch too, LOL
i have never used them as a  lure but I have added to the bottom structure of the lake with a few phones
Use a Sony water proof phone.  The you can display picture of bait and 'match the hatch' in all conditions.
Use a Sony water proof phone.  The you can display picture of bait and 'match the hatch' in all conditions.  Or run a video of bait to make it even more life like.
